name: Kindle (el0x, Bonsix)
description:
An arcade top-down shooter about keeping yourself warm made for Mini Jam 124. Run from enemies and collect stars while trying not to freeze. Remember to stay near fire!

Controls: 

  • Movement: WASD
  • Shooting: LMB
  • Kindling a fire: F

Art and music made by Bonsix. We worked as a team on this.
